data.message: dear facebook...I don't want all these junky commercials on my pages....its like junk email.....how do I block them?

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Colleen. A number of you have responded with helpful feedback, asking to see more relevant ads while having more control over which ads are seen. Learn more about how we're working to make ads better: http://on.fb.me/1kRD6Xc -Sarah
Hey Facebook! We don't want to see any ads!

Don't care about the adds just want and option to write a complained about an account that harassing me so you can describe what's going on. And and option where you can report if somebody is stealing your profile picture.

I don't want ANY ads in my newsfeed....there are enough of them on the sides of the page. Why give me the option to hide them or not see them, even asking WHY I don't want them, if you're just going to run the very same ads day after day in my newsfeed? I keep blocking the same ads. Just another waste of time.
